HotelElement.Name: Four Seasons Lion Palace St. Petersburg

Description.Text: Four Seasons Hotel Lion Palace St. Petersburg is a stunning 5-star property offering luxury accommodation in the heart of St Petersburg. Highlights include fine contemporary dining, a lavish spa, modern gym, glass-roofed pool and an excellent location neighbouring St. Isaac's Cathedral. St. Isaac's Cathedral is an impressive 19th-century structure and the city's largest Russian Orthodox place of worship. Nearby places of interest include Palace Square, the State Hermitage Museum, Alexander Garden, Sadovaya Street and the Mariinsky Theatre. Admiralteyskaya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular St. Petersburg destinations. The hotel occupies a majestic 19th-century Royal Palace featuring a grand, highly decorative, yellow facade with arched windows, columns, white detailing, much intricate carving and an imposing entrance flanked by two marble lions. Facilities include a glass-roofed swimming pool, 24-hour fitness centre, saunas, steam rooms and a contemporary spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are 38-53sqm and elegantly decorated in soft colours with traditional furniture and artwork on the walls. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod dock, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature bathrobes, slippers and complimentary luxury toiletries. Percorso serves contemporary Italian cuisine in a stunning marble, hardwood, granite and crystal-furnished space. Elsewhere, guests can enjoy exquisite Asian cuisine including refined Japanese specialities at Sintoho, whilst light Russian dishes, delicious liquors and fine champagnes are offered at the stylish Xander throughout the day. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite. ***The spa complex is due to open on approximately 01/04/2014 (subject to change).***
